role_dependencies: Installs Java on nearly any OS
Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that installs the Bitwarden CLI on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [Bitwarden CLI](https://github.com/bitwarden/cli) (i.e. bw) is a free and open-source official CLI for the [Bitwarden](https://bitwarden.com/) password manager. bw is available on Linux, macOS, and Microsoft Windows.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs the Bitwarden CLI on nearly any platform.
